categories: Kaci II Mid Waterproof Winter Boots
description:
By adding a fleecy wool-blend collar to their popular Kaci boots, Keen has brought the coziness to a whole new level. Crafted from a hardy, waterproof leather and insulated with synthetic insulation, the Kaci II boots are ready for winter.Waterproof leather from a Leather Working Group-certified tannery.Equipped with KEEN.Dry™ waterproof, breathable membrane.Insulated with KEEN.Warm insulation for cold winter’s days.Supportive EVA midsole offers lightweight comfort.Insoles are infused with a probiotic anti-odour treatment.Non-marking rubber outsole.PFC-free water repellant finish keeps you dry and your boots looking cleaner longer.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
name: Keen Kaci II Mid Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
